item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description: Hi Joseph - thanks for the invite!!! Sorry for my brief initial comment but when my buddy <a href="http://secretgeek.net/" title="SecretGeek" rel="nofollow">Leon</a> told me about this he said there was only 1 comment - his....but when I had a look there was 4 comments so I had to hurry. Anyway, thanks again.
item.content:encoded: Hi Joseph – thanks for the invite!!! Sorry for my brief initial comment but when my buddy Leon told me about this he said there was only 1 comment – his….but when I had a look there was 4 comments so I had to hurry. Anyway, thanks again.
